alert.note: Alert for Baca County Including Springfield and Eastern Comanche Grasslands; Eastern Las Animas County Including Pinon Canyon; Western Las Animas County Including Trinidad and Thatcher (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued February 15 at 5:42PM MST until February 15 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Red Flag Warning will expires at 6 PM MST for fire weather zones 230...233 and 237, which includes Baca County and the lower elevations of Las Animas County... ...RED FLAG WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 6 PM MST THIS EVENING FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 230...233 AND 237... Winds will decrease across the warned area and humidity values will increase above critical values. Based on this, the Red Flag warning will be allowed to expire at 6 pm.

area.areaDesc: Baca County Including Springfield and Eastern Comanche Grasslands; Eastern Las Animas County Including Pinon Canyon; Western Las Animas County Including Trinidad and Thatcher
